OrderItemUsageRsrcPlcy.name: OrderItemUsageRsrcPlcy
OrderItemUsageRsrcPlcy.description: Represents the policies that are used for the usage resource that's associated with the usage product added in the order item.

DrawdownOrder.description: Specifies the order that's used to debit consumption of entitlements related to the usage resource from the usage entitlement bucket.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to the order item for usage product grant record. For example, OIURG-4567

OrderItemId.description: The order item associated with the usage product.

ProductUsageResourcePolicyId.description: The product usage resource policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

RatingFrequencyPolicyId.description: The rating frequency policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageAggregationPolicyId.description: The usage aggregation policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageCommitmentPolicyId.description: The usage commitment policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageOveragePolicyId.description: The usage overage policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage product that's added in the order item.
